archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Business Contunity Plan and Arrangement Testing Process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
This process is used to verify that the business continuity plans are tested regularly.
It also verifies that the Business Continuity plans and arrangements are built/updated to meet the requirements defined in current version of Business Continuity Policy & Rule and the current processess of the services (ie. keep the Business Continuity Plan up to date from all angles).
Key outputs of the process addressess the possible improvement actions as a results of a test
